articles.content: Last week, the Canadian government announced a ban on cruise liners carrying at least 100 passengers through at least February 28, 2022. This has deeply impacted Disney Cruise Line and other cruise o… [+3709 chars]

articles.author: Zacks Equity Research
articles.title: Zynga (ZNGA) to Report Q4 Earnings: What's in the Cards? - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Zynga's (ZNGA) fourth-quarter 2020 results are likely to reflect strong performance from mobile live services, supported by new and existing franchise games.
articles.content:
Zynga ZNGA is set to report fourth-quarter 2020 results on Feb 10.
The company expects fourth-quarter revenues to be $570 million, up 41% year over year.
The Zacks Consensus Estimate for revenues i… [+5033 chars]

articles.title: Brent oil hits $60 for first time in a year (NYSEARCA:XLE) - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: The S&P energy sector (XLE +3.1%) sprints to the top of today's standings as Brent crude oil (CO1:COM) tops $60/bbl for the first time in more than a year, helped by supply cuts...
